title: Process a Drop-Ship Order
description: A customer orders an item that is not stocked in the warehouse but is instead shipped directly from a third-party supplier (drop-shipping).

tasks.description: When a drop-ship item is ordered, identify the correct supplier for that item.
tasks.expected_outcome: System identifies that the product is fulfilled by 'Supplier ABC'.

tasks.description: Automatically send a purchase order or fulfillment request to the supplier with the customer's shipping information.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully transmits the order details to the supplier's system via API or email.

tasks.description: Once the supplier provides a tracking number, update the customer's order with that information.
tasks.expected_outcome: System ingests the tracking number from the supplier and updates the customer's order.
